TopicTitle: Will KSP 2 be more stable with a new KSP2 RSS mod version installed?

Articles.Content: As we all know RSS (Real solar system) is a mod that changes the kerbol system to our own system, and from playing multiple versions over the years me (and a lot of other people) know that there are many glitches and it can get very unstable, do you guys think that with the KSP 2 Devs saying they will make modding easier for the community that it will make a ksp2 RSS mod more stable?
Well, with neither KSP2 nor RSS for KSP2 having been released yet, we'll just have to wait and see.
